channel.title: No animations or movement
channel.description: None of the enemies or NPCs move or attack me. They still make noises when hurt and rag-doll when killed though. Is this a known bug?

item.title: No animations or movement
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Yes, it’s normally caused by using an outdated save. Each update will break saves on previous versions, it’s just the way the Source engine is, unfortunately.

The solution is to start a new game from the chapter you were on. This should fix the problem.

Read full topic
